<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/interactive-host"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;&quot;Utility for testing InteractiveModelRunner.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><Highlight kind="stringliteral"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">Use it from pass-specific tests by providing a main .py which calls this library&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&#96;run&#95;interactive&#96; with an appropriate callback to provide advice.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="stringliteral"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">From .ll tests, just call the above-mentioned main as a prefix to the opt/llc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">invocation (with the appropriate flags enabling the interactive mode)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="stringliteral"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">Examples:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">test/Transforms/Inline/ML/interactive-mode.ll</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">test/CodeGen/MLRegAlloc/interactive-mode.ll</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;&quot;Send the &#96;value&#96; - currently just a scalar - formatted as per &#96;spec&#96;.&quot;&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"># just int64 for now</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> spec.element&#95;type == ctypes.c&#95;int64</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal">    temp&#95;rootname: str,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal">    make&#95;response: Callable&#91;&#91;List&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/log-reader/tensorvalue">log&#95;reader.TensorValue</a>&#93;&#93;, Union&#91;int, float&#93;&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">    process&#95;and&#95;args: List&#91;str&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">):</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;&quot;Host the compiler.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">    Args:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">      temp&#95;rootname: the base file name from which to construct the 2 pipes for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">      communicating with the compiler.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">      make&#95;response: a function that, given the current tensor values, provides a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">      response.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">      process&#95;and&#95;args: the full commandline for the compiler. It it assumed it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">      contains a flag poiting to &#96;temp&#95;rootname&#96; so that the InteractiveModeRunner</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">      would attempt communication on the same pair as this function opens.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="stringliteral"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">    This function sets up the communication with the compiler - via 2 files named</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">    &#96;temp&#95;rootname&#96;.in and &#96;temp&#95;rootname&#96;.out - prints out the received features,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">    and sends back to the compiler an advice (which it gets from &#96;make&#95;response&#96;).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">    It&#39;s used for testing, and also to showcase how to set up communication in an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">    interactive ML (&quot;gym&quot;) environment.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="stringliteral">    &quot;&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">    to&#95;compiler = temp&#95;rootname + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.in&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">    from&#95;compiler = temp&#95;rootname + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.out&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">try</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">        os.mkfifo(to&#95;compiler, 0o666)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">        os.mkfifo(from&#95;compiler, 0o666)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">        compiler&#95;proc = subprocess.Popen(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">            process&#95;and&#95;args, stderr=subprocess.PIPE, stdout=subprocess.DEVNULL</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">        )</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> io.BufferedWriter(io.FileIO(to&#95;compiler, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;wb&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> tc:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> io.BufferedReader(io.FileIO(from&#95;compiler, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;rb&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> fc:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">                tensor&#95;specs, &#95;, advice&#95;spec = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/log-reader/#ab40242c357e077a78fbfb8fd4a61cf90">log&#95;reader.read&#95;header</a>(fc)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">                context = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">None</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> compiler&#95;proc.poll() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">None</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">                    next&#95;event = fc.readline()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> next&#95;event:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">                        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">                    (</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">                        last&#95;context,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">                        observation&#95;id,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">                        features,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">                        &#95;,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">                        context, next&#95;event, fc, tensor&#95;specs, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">None</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">                    )</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> last&#95;context != context:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">                        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/archivewriter-cpp/#aa9f638c7ae7fdd206a6c60e26bef9751">print</a>(f</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;context: &#123;last&#95;context&#125;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">                    tensor&#95;values = &#91;&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
